en.p5: and make it easily fit your app
en.i1: is a straightforward React Hooks functional component that will quickly render a table from an array of objects
en.i2a: Naivetable does one thing and does it well: visualizing
en.i2b: data in a clean and concise manner
en.i2c: with a few choice assumptions on style:
en.h0a: an array of objects, just as God intended
en.h0b: give it your data, and voila!
en.h1a: if you need a rendered table of data RIGHT NOW
en.h1b: NaiveTable just infers the headers 'a', 'b', and 'c'
en.h1c: this is the most straightforward way to use NaiveTable
